title: NBC Telemundo Corporate Site
description: I was a frontend developer along side Jonathan Vasquez helping build the NBC Telemundo Corporate site. This is a static site so Gastby Js and Graphql were used to help build it. The site domain is currently not up, but this URL shows an exact replica. Different tools such as GSAP and packages like react-slick and react-responsive were just a few of the packages used in helping bring this project together.

title: Empire Medical
description: Joined Empire Medical company to help on with the implementaiton of git and github for their code versioning control and various style changes in accordence with the UX/UI designer. Site is build primarily all in BootStrap and html, with various parts using PHP.

title: Vote from Home
description: Freelance project commisioned from the Code For Miami channel. Project was not completed due to budget, but still run emails for testing using the Sendgrid API. Information is taken from user and sent over securely to Admins email using a prebuilt template for mailing. Original UX/UI designs were given for this project.

title: ShipSip
sub: ReactJs, Shippo API, Ruby on Rails, MySql, Devise gem, CSS
description: This Full Stack site groups different packaging services like UPS, FEDEX and USPS and provides full packaging labels and information. The site was built with two other Developers and I mainly was focused on building the backened which consisted of using Ruby. The main gems used were Rails of course, and Devise to build the user login and credentials. MySQl gather the user database information.
tech: ReactJs, JavaScript, ReactScroll, ReactSpring, Ruby on Rails, Devise Gem, Formspree

title: Barhop
description: Site built to provide users with location and details on nearest bars, using the yelp API. Biggest hurdle building this site was dealing with CORS and figuring out a way to extract more than the initial 100 requests. I had two teamates help in building this site.

title: Covid-19
description: Using an API I found From Mathdroid I was able to build a simple covid fact page displaying information from different regions. Wes Bos, helped in the creation of this site.

title: aereli Art
description: Personal artwork queried from datasource using Graphql built on a Gatsby framework to load images a lighting fast speed, using lazy load. This is my first attempt at using GatsbyJS with gatsby Image. Image are pre-loaded on build that way they render faster and show a glossy effect instead of no image rendering on load time.

title: splttr
description: Simple tip calculator for partys of any size using Pure Vanilla Javascript

title: Wyn-Generator
description: Selects a random student from the Wyncode cohort36 Api. This Site was a small project currently not working since the orignial database no longer exists. The Demo shows a good example of how the site used to perform.
